## Architectural Impact
Explain how this change preserves (or strengthens) the strictness and determinism of the container. 

## Description
Provide a concise summary of the changes.

## Checklist
- [ ] I have included tests that assert architectural invariants.
- [ ] I have verified that no "magic", service location, or runtime mutation was introduced.
- [ ] I have updated the documentation if the change affects the public API.
- [ ] I understand that changes violating strict DI principles will be rejected.

## Behavior Changes
- Does this change the way dependencies are resolved?
- Does it introduce any new failure modes?
